perspective: Historical Expert: This editor will focus on the historical context of the topic, outlining its origins, development over time, and any major turning points. They will ensure that the history section is rich with verified dates, events, and historical figures pertinent to the topic.

perspective: Technical Specialist: If the topic has technical aspects, this editor will provide detailed and accurate technical information. They will explain complex concepts in layman's terms and ensure that the technical section is understandable to non-experts.
